articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Celtic star Hyeongyu Oh earned his second cap for South Korea, while Daizen Maeda was an unused substitute for Japan.
articles.title: Celtic star Hyeongyu Oh earns 2nd South Korea cap but disappointment for Daizen Maeda

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Steve Clarke has signed a new Scotland deal, keeping him in charge of the national team until after the expanded 2026 World Cup which is being held in Canada, Mexico and United States.
articles.title: Steve Clarke signs new Scotland deal, contract length, SFA chief on 'easiest decision' & 'undeniable progress'

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Former Celtic defender Alan Stubbs has admitted he's have “enjoyed” playing alongside Cameron Carter-Vickers as he compared him to Virgil van Dijk.
articles.title: Celtic star earns Virgil van Dijk comparisons, player of the year claim, impressive stats

articles.author: Chris Andrews
articles.description: The leading chief of the organisers behind the controversial European Super League has revealed he has spoken to clubs in Scotland as the competition targets “domestic kings in less relevant leagues”.
articles.title: ‘Talked to clubs from Scotland' - Celtic and Rangers could land windfall, Super League target 'domestic kings'

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: The resettlement of the Scotland squad to Glasgow that now sees them train at the redeveloped Lesser Hampden has been a boon for Steve Clarke’s national team, insists his assistant John Carver.
articles.title: How Scotland will avoid any spying in their new Lesser Hampden training facility

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Ange Postecoglou will remain at Celtic next season for a crack at the Champions League, reckons former Parkhead star Alan Stubbs.
articles.title: 'Feel he can do that job' - Ange Postecoglou will remain at Celtic claims ex-star and the Rodgers comparison

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Former Hibs boss Alan Stubbs still doesn’t “know why” Celtic failed to sign John McGinn under Brendan Rodgers.
articles.title: 'I still don’t know why' - The £40m Celtic transfer misstep which baffles ex-star and Everton claim

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scotland get their Euro 2024 qualifying campaign up and running against Cyprus in front of a big crowd at Hampden Park on Saturday afternoon. For manager Steve Clarke there are a number of big decisions to be made from who starts between the sticks to which system the team play.
articles.title: Scotland team to play Cyprus: 5 big decisions for Steve Clarke ahead of opening Euro 2024 qualifier

articles.author: Jamie Gardner
articles.description: A new-look European Super League could have major benefits for Celtic and Rangers, according to the chief executive of the project.
articles.title: Celtic and Rangers could benefit from new European Super League, says project chief

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic Park was a very different place for Mikael Lustig last weekend. And the new perspective offered by detachment left him goggle-eyed.
articles.title: Former Celtic star gets the 'wow' factor during return visit and envies over current player

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: With the Scottish Premiership entering its final few months of the campaign, enough football has been played to accurately assess the six best signings across the season ...
articles.title: Six best Scottish Premiership signings this season - Celtic snip, Rangers deadeye, Hearts and Hibs favourites

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: With the Scottish Premiership entering its final few months of the campaign, enough football has been played to accurately assess the six best signings across the season ...
articles.title: Six best Scottish Premiership signings this season - Celtic surprise, Rangers deadeye, Hearts and Hibs favourites

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: The Scottish Football Association has been accused of treating fans with contempt by one of its former referees over its failure to address the controversies surrounding VAR.
articles.title: SFA accused of treating fans with contempt as former referee blasts VAR errors

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Rangers midfielder Todd Cantwell should be hit with a two-match ban after conning the referee into showing Motherwell a red card during the 4-2 win at Fir Park.
articles.title: Rangers star should be banned for Celtic Park clash after 'disgusting' act, says former referee

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Rangers midfielder Todd Cantwell should be hit with a two-match ban after conning the referee into showing Motherwell a red card during the 4-2 win at Fir Park.
articles.title: Rangers star should be banned for Celtic clash after 'disgusting' act, says former referee

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: An instant debut for late call-up Dominic Hyam has not been discounted by Scotland assistant John Carver.
articles.title: Scotland mulling over shock inclusion for Cyprus Euro 2024 qualifier

articles.author: Moira Gordon
articles.description: Holed up in the critical care unit of a London hospital, struggling to breathe, Lyndon Dykes’ thoughts were on simple survival rather than Scotland.
articles.title: Lyndon Dykes: I was in critical care in hospital fighting pneumonia - now I want to score again for Scotland

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: The Scottish Football Association is considering the use of specialist video assistant referees to improve decision-making in domestic football matches, according to reports.
articles.title: Scottish football chiefs 'considering major change to VAR protocols' for Premiership matches

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Celtic forward Kyogo Furuhashi is not dwelling on his international snub by Japan, insisting that club football is his sole focus.
articles.title: Kyogo Furuhashi breaks silence on Japan snub and responds by setting new Celtic target

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Scotland assistant boss John Carver has explained the reason behind the national team not using Oriam, the country’s national sports performance centre, labelling the training pitch “a safety hazard”.
articles.title: Severe criticism of Oriam as Scotland coach labels pitch 'safety hazard' and explains why Lesser Hampden is so good

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Scotland have handed a first call-up to Blackburn Rovers defender Dominic Hyam after losing Jack Hendry to injury ahead of the Euro 2024 qualifiers against Cyprus and Spain.
articles.title: Who is Dominic Hyam? First Scotland call-up for Blackburn defender who says he is 'definitely more Scottish than English'

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Scotland have handed a first call-up to Blackburn Rovers defender Dominic Hyam after losing Jack Hendry to injury ahead of the Euro 2024 qualifiers against Cyprus and Spain.
articles.title: Scotland squad: Celtic and Blackburn duo earn late call-ups as former Parkhead star drops out

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: The Tartan Army are eagerly anticipating the launch of a brand new Scotland kit marking the 150th anniversary of the national team.
articles.title: New Scotland strip: How much does 150th anniversary kit cost? JD Sports discount code

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Crystal Palace have appointed former manager Roy Hodgson as their new boss until the end of the season.
articles.title: Crystal Palace appoint Roy Hodgson until end of the season, 'immediate requirement', Ange Postecoglou link

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: The large-scale disturbance outside Hampden involving Cetic and Rangers ultras on the morning of last month’s Viaplay Cup final has been cited by Ally McCoist as failing to assist the case for away supports at the pair’s league derbies.
articles.title: 'Bampots haven't helped' Celtic-Rangers away support decision, claims Ibrox legend

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: Kenny Dalglish understands the pressure on both Rangers and Celtic to reduce away ticket allocations to zero for Old Firm derbies but maintains the special nature of the fixture can survive the absence of visiting supporters.
articles.title: Why Celtic v Rangers can survive latest drama to engulf Old Firm derby

articles.author: Alan Pattullo
articles.description: Ben Doak will have to achieve a significant amount before there can be talk of the Scottish teenager emulating Kenny Dalglish.
articles.title: Liverpool and Scotland starlet Ben Doak given sage Kenny Dalglish advice after move from Celtic

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Kenny Dalglish understands why there has been reported interest in from English clubs in Ange Postecoglou – but has queried why the Australian would leave Celtic.
articles.title: 'Why would he go down to the Premier League' - Celtic legend in Ange Postecoglou to England question

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: You can imagine Crawford Allan, the SFA’s head of refereeing, glancing at his phone sometime around 5pm on Saturday and thinking ‘oh, oh’. And you certainly wouldn’t have blamed him for removing the SIM card and disposing of it over the side of a bridge before driving off into the distance never to be seen or heard from ever again.
articles.title: Scottish football's 150 days of VAR tedium - disruption, fan responsibility, what is the answer?

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Hearts loan star Garang Kuol has opened up on the contents of a pep talk he received from Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou following a recent match at Parkhead.
articles.title: 'A very good moment' - Hearts star on his pep talk from Celtic's Ange Postecoglou

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Ally McCoist has called on Scottish football to ditch VAR after a weekend of highly controversial decisions in the cinch Premiership.
articles.title: Ally McCoist admits change of mind as Rangers legend urges Scottish football to ditch VAR

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: The Tartan Army are eagerly anticipating the launch of a brand new Scotland kit marking the 150th anniversary of the national team.
articles.title: New Scotland strip: How much will it cost? When will 150th anniversary kit be released?

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic fans have been warned to prepare for the departure of Liel Abada this summer after the president of his former club claimed the winger has rejected a new contract offer.
articles.title: Celtic '90 per cent' certain to lose key first-team star this summer after new contract 'rejected'

articles.description: Celtic’s Aaron Mooy has been forced to withdraw from the Australia squad due to injury.
articles.title: Celtic's Aaron Mooy forced to withdraw from Australia squad as SPFL star called up in his place
